name: Power Generator (TL-7)
description: Low-tech power plant with a 1-day internal fuel supply. Powers one Size 5 item, or two Size 4 items, or four Size 3 items. TL 7 and below have few or no digital elements, and produce tainted air as a by-product.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
